title: FS: Lot of 12 Low Grade T207 Recruit Commons - Several Tough Ones

posts.post_title: FS: Lot of 12 Low Grade T207 Recruit Commons - Several Tough Ones
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T207 cards available for sale. Several of these are among the tougher of the Recruit class commons.  All are low grade with obvious condition flaws.

Please add $4 shipping (USPS Ground Advantage which includes $100 insurance) for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Prices listed are net to me, via any payment method you prefer.

Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

CARDS PICTURED:

[STRIKE]Chalmers - $25 **SOLD**[/STRIKE]
Golden - $22
[STRIKE]Gowdy - $45 **SOLD**[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Hall - $50 **SOLD**[/STRIKE]
Hamilton - $30

[STRIKE]Lord - $35  **SOLD**[/STRIKE]
McLean - $30

[STRIKE]Spratt - $35 **SOLD**[/STRIKE]

I'll take Gowdy.
PM sent.
Ben
